If the Bible is the Word of God, would it not be rational (sensible) to base your science on this? 
 
 
 It is irrational to assume that the Bible is the word of God. There is no evidence.
 
 
The Bible does not stop this [thinking for yourself]
 
 
 To an extent, it does. Jesus continually says "believe in me" - he emphasises blind faith over reason, and that isn't thinking for yourself.
 
 
We do. [question everything]
 
 
 Technically, if you don't question the Bible, then you don't question everything.
 
 
evolution is not real science, but a belief system or religion about the past 

 
 OK, maybe evolution was a bad analogy. But one thing is for sure - evolution is not a religion. Nobody worships the idea of apes evolving fom man (correct me if there's some crazy cult I don't know about.) Evolution is a theory derived from micro-evolution (i.e. we have observed species change and evolve during human history.)
 
 To call every belief system a religion is absurd. Maybe people should start converting to Democracy. Or let's send out the missionaries of Relativity. Be sure to go to the Church of Macchiavellianism every Sunday!
 
 Another, probably better analogy would be the imprisoning of Galileo.
